txt.en: 'Stay a moment, [placeholder]. Aragorn has asked me to make his coming known to what Morgul Orcs have regrouped in nearby Ithilien, so that word may be spread among their loathsome kind. If it were you who stood before them and proclaimed the true king of Gondor returning, I vouch it would strike some fear into their hearts. It might even put some bravery into the chests of my men here at the Cross-roads!'
With the Host of the West on the march, Angbor has been given orders to proclaim the King's return.
Morgul lurkers can be found in the wooded land south of the after-battle Cross-roads.\n\nYou should proclaim the King's return to any Morgul Orcs lurking nearby.
'Exemplary work. I am certain they ran like the cowards they are.'
You should talk to Angbor, who can be found at the after-battle Cross-roads.
You proclaim loudly the return of the true King of Gondor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Tell Morgul lurkers of the King's return ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
